name: elimph
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c2, wcel(c0, c1)), c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cn0v, c3))
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
body.pretty:
⊢ if(c0 ∈ c1, c0, c2)∈ c1
⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(0vec ` c3)
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c2, wcel(c0, c1)), c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cn0v, c3))
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ if(c0 ∈ c1, c0, c2)∈ c1
⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(0vec ` c3)
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c2, wcel(c0, c1)), c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cn0v, c3))
-| wcel(c3, ccphlo)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ if(c0 ∈ c1, c0, c2)∈ c1
⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(0vec ` c3)
⊣ c3 ∈ CPreHilOLD

comment: Hypothesis elimination lemma for complex inner product spaces to assist weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
